segments.text: Is This where I pay the airport tax ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . Just as the sign says . How many ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but I've never done this before . How many what ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many people are you paying the tax for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wife and me . The two of us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 100 yuan each , so you owe me 200 yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . What shall I do then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just give these receipts to the lady at the door to immigration . Don't worry , she'll ask for them from you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I guess I'm a little confused .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are all the same the first time we travel overseas . You guys have a nice trip .
segments.speaker: S1
